threads.title: Marvel Rivals - Best Characters?
threads.content: I'm loving Marvel Rivals! Which characters do you think are the best in the game?

replies.content: I think Thor and Iron Man are the best. They have great abilities!
I prefer Black Panther for his agility. He's a beast in close combat!

threads.title: The Forest - Surviving the Night
threads.content: What are your tips for surviving your first night in The Forest?

replies.content: Definitely build a shelter as soon as you can. You'll need protection from the cannibals!
Don't forget to light a fire! It keeps the mutants away at night.
